title: WaveSpeed AI - Transform Your Photos into Stunning Cartoons

hero.heading: Transform Your Photos into Cartoons
hero.description: Turn your ordinary images into vibrant cartoon art effortlessly with our AI technology.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Cartoonize my vacation photo, create a cartoon of my pet, turn my portrait into a comic style...

examples.heading: Cartoon Transformations
examples.description: Explore incredible transformations as WaveSpeed AI brings your photos to life in cartoon style.

items.title: Fun Character Creation
items.imageAlt: Example showing a photo turned into a cartoon character
items.description: Create whimsical cartoon characters from your favorite images.

items.title: Artistic Portraits
items.imageAlt: Example showing a portrait as a cartoon
items.description: Transform ordinary portraits into stunning works of art.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Cartoonization?
features.description: Experience the magic of turning photos into art effortlessly.

items.title: Artistic Styles
items.description: Choose from various cartoon styles that suit your artistic vision.

items.title: User Friendly
items.description: No artistic skills required. Upload your photo and let our AI bring it to life.

items.title: Privacy Assured
items.description: All transformations are processed securely in your browser, ensuring your images remain private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three easy steps to cartoonize your images.

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse to select the image you want to transform. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Cartoonization
items.description: Our advanced technology analyzes your image and applies cartoon effects while preserving key details.

items.title: Download Your Cartoon
items.description: Preview your cartoonized image and download it in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Are Saying
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users who have transformed their photos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: I loved how my travel photos turned into fun cartoons! It adds a playful touch to my social media.

items.name: James Liu
items.comment: As an illustrator, I appreciate how easy it is to create cartoon versions of my sketches. A fantastic tool!

items.name: Laura Green
items.comment: The AI did a fantastic job! I was surprised to see my family photos transformed into colorful cartoons.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about Avatar Creator

items.title: What styles are available for cartoonization?
items.description: Our AI offers a variety of cartoon styles, including classic cartoon, comic book, and painterly effects to suit different artistic preferences.

items.title: Is it free to use the cartoonization feature?
items.description: Absolutely! You can use our cartoonizer with daily free credits. Enjoy creating countless cartoon images at no cost.

items.title: Can I use cartoonized images commercially?
items.description: Yes, users with a paid subscription can use cartoonized images for commercial projects. Please check our Terms of Service for more details.

items.title: How does privacy work with my images?
items.description: All images are processed in your browser without any data being uploaded to our servers. Your privacy and security are our top priority.

footer.heading: Ready to Cartoonize Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see your photos transformed into cartoons. No sign-up needed.
